assessments.status_rationale: No confirmed BIS Entity List additions naming at least three China-based entities for chip-export evasion or illicit AI chip acquisition were reported; tariff and export-control rhetoric alone is not dispositive, and the deadline is still ahead.
Today’s coverage does not provide a definitive USD/CNH print at or above 7.40; verification requires market data (e.g., Yahoo Finance CNH=X) before the 2025-11-30 deadline.
No cited evidence of EUR/USD touching 1.0300 or lower; needs exchange-rate data (EURUSD=X) and the window remains open until 2025-11-30.
No settlement data showing NYMEX WTI at or above $92 was provided; requires official CL front-month settlements, and the deadline has not passed.
No ICE Endex Dutch TTF front-month settlement at or above €45/MWh reported; must check official settlement prints before 2025-11-15.
No EIA Weekly Petroleum Status Report cited a ≥4.0 million barrel distillate draw; confirmation depends on upcoming EIA releases through 2025-10-31.
ISM Services PMI for October 2025 has not been released; today’s news offers no print, and the report is due by 2025-11-05.
Final University of Michigan October 2025 sentiment has not been published; no figures provided, and the release is due 2025-10-25.
Articles mention Sora but do not show App Store Top Free chart positions; requires daily U.S. iOS rankings to confirm ≥5 distinct Top 5 days within 2025-10-10 to 2025-10-31.
No joint Paramount–WBD definitive merger agreement was reported; absence of news does not finalize the forecast before the 2025-11-30 deadline.
